data.message:
my brother can not get on his facebook. It's telling him this:

Contact Facebook If you want to use the existing name on your account, please provide documentation that shows this name. To learn more about why we require this and what types of document...See More
October 13 at 10:51am

I sent his id pic and name....please open his account!!! We are waiting for some kind of answer..I have written in several places now with no response!
October 14 at 11:01am

ok now it's 10/16/2014...still no answers for my brother anywhere. Nice.........I don't know why someone can't answer him or I about him being locked out of his facebook...he sent his ID I sent his ID...WHY IS IT STILL LOCKED?
Yesterday at 4:32pm

still talking to myself I see...it's now Friday and my brother has still not gotten any response about his facebook being unblocked pretty sad. Why can't we get any answers or help here?   Monday the 20th now...still no answer from anyone.

replies.message: They don't respond. It's awful. They told me to private message them over someone using pictures of my home without my permission and my address for their business and it's been 5 days.

That's terrible Jessi!  I don't know why we can't get any answers here..I've private messaged them, commented them, made out complaints and have gotten NOTHING!  My brother pays for the games he plays and it's been 8 days now locked out of his page :/
It may be becauze the name on his fb account isint his real name maybe change it 2 his real name I think they should let u use a diffrent name if u want(if its not 4 bullying)but they usually dont
he uses his real name. They asked for ID and we sent it.

well it's been 8 days and he sent in his ID and I sent in his ID and I see facebook people are on here answering questions now and hasn't answered mine AGAIN....I just don't understand why they won't help him or me.
